boat.name: Wingoes
boat.full_description: Mentioned by Eric Hiscock in Cruising Under Sail, Wingoes was a live-aboard first in the Hamble and then in the river Fal for many years from 1964, first off Flushing and then in Sailors Creek. After her death she was sold and kept ashore at Falmouth Marina. She was in need of some internal woodwork when she was lifted out and suffered more deterioration thereafter.  Soon after in September 2003 she was lying Portleven and for sale by member Bob Allan in Gaffers Log as a part finished rebuild with all her drawings and plans, all the beams and carlins ready, and in a clean state but still 10 new planks and a new deck.  Her current location and condition is not known.
boat.short_description: Mentioned by Eric Hiscock in Cruising Under Sail
